title: DOUG DEMURO
description:
If you like cars and have an internet connection, you've probably heard of Doug Demuro.He came to prominence by writing hilarious articles about the (now gone) unlimited warranties sold at CarMax. He has one of the biggest YouTube channels in the automotive space, focusing on showing people the details of cars new and old. 

 

Find everything Doug does here: https://www.autotrader.com/oversteer

This show is also a video: https://youtu.be/Ht9AGOWpROw

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @dougdemuro

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @dougdemuro

 

Check out our merch!

https://teespring.com/stores/thesmokingtire?page=1
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
